content.raw:
Yes, looks like that. version 1.10 is not depending on curl in [debian experimental](http://packages.debian.org/experimental/gdal-bin). Si it could be doable but gdal is a package with [a lot of dependencies](http://packages.ubuntu.com/source/trusty/gdal) and some of them could not be available for our supported platforms (look at libfreexl-dev in precise). It would need some work.

Do we have more information about what upstream have done to remove the dependency on curl?
